title.narrative: 2015 Management Project - FI African Partner Scoping Work

description.narrative:
A scoping study to identify a range of potential African partners in the financial inclusion space across 24 countries in Sub-Saharan Africa. A report will be produced that provides insight into key gaps in financial inclusion in various African countries, while also identifying organizations that can be supported and scaled up for maximum impact in future programming. The report will shortlist potential partners who possess strong financial inclusion expertise, combined with the organizational capacity to implement Foundation activities.
This project will complement the African Partner Scoping work being commissioned by the EOY Team, led by Dalberg.
